Despite the setback, he remains determined, seeking hope and a path to redemption. Blending intricate suspense with deeply moving human stories, the series delivers a captivating and grand narrative.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 21
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Crazy Delicious - EP 2
programme.desc: A food documentary that travels throughout China in search of "exotic" delicacies and experiences local customs to explore the relationship between food, region, and the humanities.

programme.title: Love Like the Galaxy - EP 26

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 4
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 4
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam Et Julia - EP 9
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 27
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.desc: Salmon, red tuna and scallops, are they really as wild as all that? Hugo Clement reveals the behind-the-scenes reality of industrial fishing and how France's favourite fish are produced. What seafood should we eat in order to continue to respect marine life? Investigation.

programme.title: Les Rencontres Du Papotin - EP 5
programme.desc: A magazine programme with a difference, along similar lines to the newspaper ''Le Papotin'', with an editorial team of young non-professional journalists on the autism spectrum. For each programme a well-known figure is subjected to a no-holds-barred interview. The rules are simple: anything can be said and anything can happen!

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: The Villele Museum covers the history of Reunion Island and of slavery in the 18th century. From minuscule to immense, Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and assembles, plunging us into a different dimension. Marine Serre: the 2025 spring-summer collection, veritable message of love. Severine and Christophe, manufacturing Basque knives.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Quand Les Bourgeois Font Leur Cinema
programme.desc: Has French cinema become middle-class? In the beginning it was considered an art for the people, its films politically-committed, their message one of protest. What happened? We look back at the history of the film industry in France. With personal views and accounts by Jan Kounen, Thierry Fremeaux, Henri-Jean Servat...

programme.title: Crime A Biot
programme.desc: Marie Lemaire, wealthy heiress, is poisoned during a dinner of the Biot Trade Association, making all the guests potential suspects. Two days later, another of those present dies, poisoned, leaving a suicide note and confessing to the murder. But the deputy public prosecutor elisabeth Richard remains unconvinced.

programme.title: La Permission
programme.desc: Turner, a black American soldier, meets Miriam, a white French woman, during a three-day pass in Paris. They decide to spend the weekend together in a hotel in Normandy but are confronted with racial prejudice.

programme.title: A La Recherche Du Legume Star - EP 4
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 6
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 5
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 5
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam Et Julia - EP 10
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 29
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 30
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda - EP 7
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 10
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 1
programme.desc: After a beam collapses in the cellar evelyne decides to change career and go into the building trade. Vic panics at the idea of her mother attending her school and Felix decides to play head of the family for Flavie.

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 45
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - EP 27

programme.title: Safran Et Saveurs By Chef Simo - EP 10
programme.desc: Chef Simo creates a unique dish with a fusion of Moroccan taktouka and Algerian shakshuka. Grilled sweet pepper, juicy tomatoes, runny eggs... To enjoy without moderation!

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 13
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 12
programme.desc: Welcome to Menton, a town of art and history. Between its colourful Italian-style facades, cobbled streets, bright blue sea, Belle epoque architecture, lush gardens, the town has much to offer. Situated on the French Riviera, between Monaco and the Italian border, Menton also enjoys an exceptional microclimate.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses - EP 1
programme.desc: The guard dog considers sheep as member of its own family. We accompany the masters and their dogs at work in the alpine pastures. An opportunity to find out more about their relationship and the hard work that the presence of wolves in the country implies.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

A meeting that will upend her summer...

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 33
programme.desc: Arriving on Merseyside in 2004 as part of a freshly recruited Spanish contingent to help build a new-look Liverpool side, Luis Garcia soon became a cult hero at Anfield. But it wasn't always plain sailing for the Catalonian. In this week's Big Interview, Garcia shares the difficulties he faced adjusting to the Premier League, how Rafa Benitez managed to hone his talents and his thoughts on that famous "ghost" goal against Chelsea in the 2005 Champions League semi-final.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 43
programme.desc: Eduardo da Silva will forever be synonymous for suffering one of the worst injuries in Premier League history. We travelled to Brazil, Croatia and caught up with the former Arsenal hero here in England to find out more about the man who gave Gunners fans a fleeting glimpse of greatness before being so cruelly deprived.

programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.desc: He was a star of Australia's U23 and U17 teams and made his West Ham debut at just 18 years of age, but in 2011 Dylan Tombides life was turned upside down when he received a diagnosis of testicular cancer following a routine drug test during the Under-17 FIFA World Cup. Despite a courageous three-year battle, he tragically succumbed to the illness at the age of 20 in 2014.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: Nemanja Vidic grew up in war-torn Serbia and went on to become one of the greatest defenders in English football. PL Stories sits down with him to explore his journey from Belgrade to Manchester. We also hear from former coaches and players about how his childhood shaped him into the person he is today and his lasting impact on the Premier League.

programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.desc: We delve into the careers of some of the most enigmatic and unpredictable footballers to have graced the English top-flight in recent years and find out how they became 'Premier League mavericks'. programme.title: FS MMA Dennis Hallman vs. Jeremiah Metcalf
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Each fighter is a submission specialist and one fighter ends the bout with a submission victory inside the first round when Dennis "Superman" Hallman meets Jeremiah Metcalf in a middleweight fight from San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a light heavyweight championship match between Joe Calzaghe (45-0, 32 KOs) and Roy Jones Jr. (52-4, 38 KOs) from Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, USA, on November 8, 2008.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Nordin Ben Moh vs Jonay Risco
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Antwerp, Belgium, features main event Nordin Ben Moh (Morocco) vs Jonay Risco (Spain) plus Percy De Maeyer vs. Ali Makhi and Mohamed El Moussaoui vs. Filip Verlinden.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Kotoyuki, Asanoyama, Aoiyama and Ryuden from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: Greatest Classics George Foreman vs. Ken Lakusta
programme.desc: After a ten-year layoff, "Big" George Foreman made his much-publicized return to the boxing ring in March of 1987. Despite the critics saying he was too old to make a serious run at another World Championship, Foreman began rattling off a string of victories that ultimately had the world taking notice.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams (II)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the second encounter between middleweights Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez. This time around, championship gold is on the line in a bout that will not go the distance. Also on the card, Marcos Maidana tries to jump up a weight class.

programme.desc: Krash is waiting for the Jack to spring out from the box. However he misses it every time.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 1

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Evil Pea thinks the Veggies won't like it when she covers the Supermarket in ice, but instead they have the best snow day ever, so she creates a giant snowball to ruin their fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 35
programme.desc: When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.desc: The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.desc: Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.desc: An infamous Cold War cold case: nine hikers were found mutilated on a remote mountain slope. For over 60 years, authorities and amateurs have been trying to figure out what happened.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15) - EP 232
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from a valley in Peru with over 250 hidden pyramids to an ancient Greek city with 4800-year-old ruins to Egypt's famous Giza Plateau.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII - EP 5
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrell Miklos and his team make a discovery far older than they expected. Later, new evidence emerges suggesting that the team may have uncovered a long-lost battle at Target 4.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Did you ever wonder what it would be like to get attacked by a million bats with tiny bombs strapped to their chests? What about inflatable tanks, robot assassins, bazooka Vespas, war dolphins...

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: The American frontier is rich with legends of Native Americans and outlaws, but also eerie tales of cursed mountains, monsters, and UFOs. Could these tales be true? Is the Wild West stranger than we think?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: Matty Blake meets with the team to delve deeper into the moment when they witnessed an unidentified aerial phenomenon entering a rocky mesa on the mysterious property known as Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: 100 years ago, shipping packages was slow, and shipping overnight was impossible, until two Seattle brothers risk everything to reinvent shipping packages for all.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16) - EP 254
programme.desc: Throughout ancient cultures, there are stories of god-like beings providing instruction to early humans, helping our ancestors to establish the first civilisations and teaching them. Could it be true?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10) - EP 5
programme.desc: The team is astonished when Gary unearths multiple artefacts in close proximity to the old ship's wharf and Marty's theory of an off-set chamber may finally be proven.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14) - EP 3
programme.desc: Ronnie faces a challenge in his own territory. Joey and Zak use pig heads to lure in giants. Leron and Porkchop battle a poacher stealing their catch. Troy places a big bet on Spearhead Lake.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: The team enlists special equipment in an epic search for two large air force planes that vanished without a trace with dozens of people on board. Despite a massive search, nothing was ever found.

programme.desc: A shift in weather tests the strength of the survivalists' shelters as well as their resolve. Unable to exit their shelters, one survivalist carves out ways to pass the time as another struggles to cope.

programme.title: FDR (Franklin D. Roosevelt) - EP 2
programme.desc: As Hitler sweeps across Europe, Franklin prepares a reluctant nation for war. Following the devastating attack on Pearl Harbor, he leads America into the greatest conflict the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8) - EP 48
programme.desc: Competitor turned Judge Ben Abbott remains undefeated in the forge, but soon that could all change. Two of the smiths who faced Ben in his very first competition are back to seek revenge.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a man's chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 10
programme.desc: During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 12
programme.desc: After an overpass collapses on the highway, Team Tennyson is in a traffic jam along with Simon Sez and family, but when Ben and Simon team up to tackle the gridlock together, Simon only makes matters much, much worse.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 13
programme.desc: At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Ben and family go to London to visit the legendary Big Ben, the Bugg Brothers are there to greet them - with yet another outrageously over-the-top plan of course: to shrink the Big Ben bell in order to steal it!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 15
programme.desc: After traveling to Tampa Beach, Florida, Team Tennyson hope to get some much-needed rest & relaxation, but the tempests without a temper, the Weatherheads, have other plans that Ben must thwart: to build a new beach base!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 16
programme.desc: While visiting China, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max take a trek to the Great Wall, but their adventure is nearly ruined by daredevils LaGrange and Vin Ethanol trying to jump the international monument, and Ben must hop into the Rustbuggy to chase away the fast and furious foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 17
programme.desc: During a family cookout at a forest campsite, Charmcaster users her magic to switch places with Gwen, but when Ben catches 'Charmcaster' sneaking about, he attacks- unaware it's actually his cursed cousin!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 18
programme.desc: In Aspen, Colorado, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max are on a hike to find the Forgeti, but when they realize they've stumbled upon Billy Billions own 'Winter in July' ski resort, Ben must battle Billy-with an assist from the Forgeti itself.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: Ben hops into the Rustbuggy for a driving lesson along the sand dunes of Cape Cod, but he takes a freaky switchback turn when the Rustbuggy is mutated into a motor-monster by Bootleg - another alien transformation of Kevin 11, with powers similar to Upgrade!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: Team Tennyson travel to the Chrysalen Institute for some hot yoga and good vibes, only to find that the Bugg Brothers are on vacation, too- but are the sneaky insectoids really on holiday, or just cooking up yet another silly, yet high stakes scheme?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 21
programme.desc: After a battle with Kevin gets mysteriously cut short, Ben turns his attention to one-upping Gwen at Space Camp, but when his arch-nemesis, Kevin, returns with his sights strangely set on his cousin, our hero must uncover who is really behind it all: Charmcaster!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 22
programme.desc: When attacked in the jungle, Team Tennyson is saved by a toddler who looks eerily similar to Tim Buktu, but when they discover it really is a pint-sized version of the nefarious globetrotter, Ben knows there's another threat looming: Nanny Nightmare!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 23
programme.desc: After enjoying some local corn, Team Tennyson discovers a Hartfield-McJoy reenactment in the cornfield next door, but when Hex resurrects the ghosts of the real feuding families, Ben must find a way to bring them together if he is to save the day!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 24
programme.desc: When a mysterious electrical storm downs the Omni-Copter at the Equator, Team Tennyson soon discovers Solar & Polar are behind it, but when Ben accidentally combines the two into a more powerful Uni-Twin, our hero must think fast if he is going to save the planet!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 25
programme.desc: Team Tennyson discovers that a small village's goats are being terrorized by the legendary Chupacabra, but when Ben realizes it's actually Dr. Animo, our hero must thwart the dastardly doctor before he uses the essence of the goats to power up into an unstoppable form!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 26
programme.desc: Team Tennyson discovers that a small village's goats are being terrorized by the legendary Chupacabra, but when Ben realizes it's actually Dr. Animo, our hero must thwart the dastardly doctor before he uses the essence of the goats to power up into an unstoppable form!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 27
programme.desc: After winning a Sumo Slammers Champion belt, Ben returns to the Rustbucket to find his prize in the arms of Kevin, but when his rival hijacks the Rustbuggy instead, our hero must stop at nothing to get back what's rightfully his!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 28
programme.desc: At a local swap meet, Ben instead sets his sights on a Sumo Slammer collectible, but when Kevin takes it for himself, our hero must get it back by overcoming Kevin's secret weapon: an 11th alien!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 29
programme.desc: During their visit to Twin City, Ben and Gwen sign up for some Laser Town awesomeness, but when Ben is teamed up with Kevin, the two must overcome their differences if they are to end up on top!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 30
programme.desc: After saving a State University Alumni ribbon cutting ceremony, Ben becomes the guest of honor at the upcoming Gala, but when the cirque entertainment turns out to be Zombozo-in-disguise, Ben must not only defeat the evil clown but his mysterious new sidekick: Pirouette!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 31
programme.desc: During a drag race, Ben hopes to stay neck and neck with Vin Ethanol and La Grange as XLR8, but when his watch keeps shorting out, our hero must get creative if he is to keep up with his fast and furious foes!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 32
programme.desc: After stuffing their faces with gyros, Team Tennyson makes their way to the real Greece in the Omni-Copter, but when they are suddenly captured by the Forever Knight mid-flight, Ben ends up in a coliseum, where he is pit against old foes: Iron Kyle, Queen Bee, and the Ground Hawgs!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 33
programme.desc: After receiving a super-exclusive ticket to Adrenaland, Ben leaves behind Grandpa Max and Gwen to enjoy the perks of being the parks only attendant, but when he learns he's not alone, our hero must now contend with the only kid who could afford the price of admission: Billy Billions!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 34
programme.desc: While taking in the sights and sounds of a Rio de Jenaro music festival, Ben bristles at Gwen's suggestion that she be his new sidekick, but when the festival is threaten by the supersonic sound waves of Lord Decibel, our hero must lean on help from some familiar faces: DJ Gpa and Gwen-Cat!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 35
programme.desc: During a visit to the farm of Penny Bennyson's grandfather, Team Tennyson is constantly haunted by a Scare-Crow that's come to life, our hero must defeat Aristocrow's master.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 36
programme.desc: Team Tennyson travels to Wheeler, 'the liveliest mining town on Route 66', but when Ben becomes paranoid that the Forever Knight is out to get him, he must try to convince his fam while also stopping his new foe from destroying the town.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 37
programme.desc: When a new Xingo app mysteriously appears on Gwen's tablet, Ben can't help himself and activates it despite his cousin's disapproval, springing a trap that transports Ben in the animated world and Xingo back in the real world. It's the ol' switcheroo!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 48

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Captain Blacque Jacque Shellaque is searching the high seas for the mythical Slugsmoby. He gets more trouble than help whe he drafts Bugs Bunny to be his first mate.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: Bugs attends an MMA match and sees champion fighter Rhoda Roundhouse cheating. When he calls her out, she challenges him to a fight and the match is on.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 51
programme.desc: Viktor is a clown in The Pretentious Circus when his act is ruined by a critical onlooker, Daffy Duck. Daffy goes out of his way to show Viktor what he thinks a circus should be.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: When a couple of kids get lost in the mall, Bugs entertains them with a strange and imaginative tale until their mom comes, drawing on things around them for inspiration.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 53
programme.desc: Porky is determined to get his Halloween candy back from Daffy, who's hiding in a creep- looking house. But Daffy, and the house, have other plans.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 54
programme.desc: When Wile E. Coyote discovers that the secret behind AcmeInstant's instant delivery service is The Road Runner, he pulls out all the stops to try and capture him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 55
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian is planning an invasion of Earth, but decides he must study a typical Earthling before doing so. Unfortunately for him, the Earthling he chooses is Daffy Duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 56
programme.desc: Leslie is jealous when Bugs is appointed the new Knight of Square Table, so he tries everything to take Bugs out and replace him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 57
programme.desc: Pepe Le Pew and Claudette are assigned the same mission in an art gallery. While Claudette keeps her eyes on the mission, Pepe keeps his eyes on Claudette.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 58
programme.desc: In this 'mostly musical' episode, Bugs agrees to take care of Porky's two hamsters. He brings them home, and wakes up the next morning to find out that the hamsters have multiplied and taken over.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 59
programme.desc: Bugs and Cecil each get half of the last dozen Potato Balls from a popular food truck. When they learn they're going to the same party, the race is on to see who can arrive with the snacks first.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 60
programme.desc: When Count BloodCount steals all the blood from the blood bank, Vampire Hunter Daffy Duck joins a frightened Porky Pig to get it back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 61
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 62
programme.desc: With the threat of a snowy avalanche looming, it is up to Porky the Mountie to evacuate all the residents of the remote Canadian forest - unfortunately for him, Daffy is one of those residents.

programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 66
programme.desc: The easily riled Gabby Goat makes a stop at Porky Pig's Day Spa to try and relax.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 67

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 68
programme.desc: Claudette and Pepe Le Pew are ordered to the moon to stop evil Elmer Blofudd from destroying the world. The mission will be completed if Claudette can keep Pepe's focus on Blofudd instead of on her.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 69
programme.desc: After exposure to Wile E. Coyote's invention, Tweety Bird has the power to transform into Monster Tweety. When Sylvester tries to make Tweety his lunch, he is terrorised by this new menacing beast.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 70
programme.desc: Bugs finds himself in Area 51, and meets an intelligent Martian baby named Mot. He decides to help the adorable alien escape, but first they must get through four-star general Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 71
programme.desc: Porky is on trial for a minor violation, and is assigned Daffy Duck as an attorney. What could go wrong?

programme.desc: Tad Tucker is interviewed on the Shelley Lippa show in Sydney to talk about his lifestyle. When Bugs finds out that part of that lifestyle is eating rabbits, he decides to do make a fool out of Tad.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 73
programme.desc: After a plane crash, Porky and Daffy end up stranded on a deserted island together. Porky references a survival guide, while Daffy takes a more 'wing it' approach.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 74
programme.desc: Elmer goes hunting for the title ingredient in his duck gumbo, but Daffy turns out to be not-so-cooperative prey.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 76

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Rerun)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The World From Above S1
programme.desc: A highly popular, breathtaking series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft down to just a few feet above the ground, we discover new perspectives through thrilling journeys: from mountains and the world's most picturesque cities, to fantastic castles and the great natural wonders of the globe.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda
programme.desc: Nunung is a rich widow who has an only child (Anita Hara). Nunung already has a husband-to-be and wants to get married but is embarrassed because Anita hasn't gotten married yet. Meanwhile, Anita, who also has a husband-to-be (Bedu), doesn't want to get married if her mother (Nunung) isn't married yet.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

programme.title: Cahaya Ramadan
programme.desc: An Islamic Talkshow program that is studied in depth with a Doctor of Philosophy, Fahrudin Faiz, the pioneer of "Ngaji Filsafat" and hosted by Maman Suherman or commonly called "Kang Maman".

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Life Hacks
programme.desc: DIY projects are not that difficult, you need to find an interesting one to start creating your own. To help you, here we bring you a few fantastic inspirations.

programme.title: Indonesia Art Talk
programme.desc: A program that will show the artwork of every talented artist with all the achievements obtained. extraordinary work will amaze the audience.

programme.title: Art See Asia
programme.desc: Over 48 hours, the host engages in art challenges, participates in an exclusive masterclass and experiences lesser-known local art sounds and sights. The series Art.See.Asia will give an exclusive and atmospheric insight into the art scene of Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Bangkok, Jakarta and Taipei. For art and travel enthusiasts, Art.See.Asia is the ultimate insight into the cities' thriving art culture!

programme.title: Behind The Creators
programme.desc: Behind The Creators is a program about the process behind the works that produced by content creators. Starting from the idea, the production process, the results, and evaluating the work.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Woman's Diary
programme.desc: Revealing the lives of noble-hearted Indonesian socialite women. Seeing that many people like luxury lifestyle content, this program will tell how the luxury lifestyle becomes meaningful.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Beyond Boundaries
programme.desc: BEYOND BOUNDARIES is a message that women are strong figures who can be equal in their own way. They will tell you about their love for the automotive world, the value of life, and the satisfaction they get. The program will cover one subject per episode, with different backgrounds. How much fun they have riding motorbikes, the community, and how the people around them respond.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. Despite the setback, he remains determined, seeking hope and a path to redemption. Blending intricate suspense with deeply moving human stories, the series delivers a captivating and grand narrative.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 21
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Crazy Delicious - EP 2
programme.desc: A food documentary that travels throughout China in search of "exotic" delicacies and experiences local customs to explore the relationship between food, region, and the humanities.

programme.title: Love Like the Galaxy - EP 26
programme.desc: Young girl Cheng Shao Shang was left behind because her parents had gone off to fight in the war. In order to protect herself in a toxic environment, she needs to be extra diligent while pretending to be the opposite.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Al Cappuccino - EP 23
programme.desc: Struggling actor Cheung Sai Lun gets invited to act as the son of a mafia boss and somehow gets forced into becoming a police informant. While working with undercover Ko Ban, he experiences a series of extraordinary comedic events.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 10
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2522
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Song of Youth - EP 40
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun is the daughter of a once-powerful government official. After being accused of corruption, her father and the rest of the family fall from grace. To make ends meet, she joins a troupe of travelling performers, but intends to avenge those who wronged her family.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: All-You-Can-Learn in Taiwan
programme.desc: The hosts visit campuses across Taiwan, enrolling in a variety of "special" courses. Through the sharing experiences of the hosts, teachers and students, viewers' conceptions of education are overturned, and the long-lost fun of "going back to school" is found!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 12
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Under The Microscope - EP 14
programme.desc: The period drama revolves around mathematician Shuai Jia Mo who stumbles upon an old accounting issue in the local municipal level. While attempting to correct the mistake, he triggers tension with upper government officials.

programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 15
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 5
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 19
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wan’s younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 1
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 18
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Angel In-the-Making - EP 25
programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 6
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 4
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 5
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).
